data.message:
Slip the pin from the highest point of earth...

Watch it spin and go berzerk

Countries tip and flip like dominos

Aliances crumble like shady pimps n hoes

Old asses in the senate gettin rolled up on

Authority figures getting told up son

Old busted ass white house gettin 60 minutes'd 

Poor gettin cash put someones ass and then 

eatin fried chicken and then brotha we can kick it like no boundaries citizens instead of in this sheep pin.
